unnormalised: ## Going Viral, Bollywood Style: What's Trending Right Now?
normalised: ## Going Viral, Bollywood Style: What's Trending Right Now?

unnormalised: Hey everyone, let's talk virality! In the crazy world of social media & influencer marketing, things change faster than you can say "chai break." What was hot yesterday is totally "thanda" today. So, what's making waves right now in India, and what can we learn from it?
normalised: Hey everyone, let's talk virality! In the crazy world of social media and influencer marketing, things change faster than you can say "chai break." What was hot yesterday is totally "thanda" today. So, what's making waves right now in India, and what can we learn from it?

unnormalised: First off, dance challenges are still reigning supreme. Remember that "Nach Baliye" step everyone was doing back in 2015? Well, something similar is happening now with a new Bollywood song – "Jhoom Barabar Jhoom". Even your aunties in Delhi are trying it! The key? It’s simple, catchy, and shareable. Think accessible choreography – no complicated "Kathak" moves needed!

unnormalised: Secondly, meme culture is always a safe bet. From relatable jokes about surviving Mumbai traffic at 09:00 hrs to poking fun at your annoying "rishtedaars" during Diwali, authentic and localized humor goes a long way. Remember that meme featuring a stressed-out aunty saying "Beta, engineering karlo?" Still gold, right? Brands are smart to tap into this. I saw a local Jaipur sweet shop using it to promote their "ghevar" – genius!

unnormalised: Then there's the influencer effect. When someone like Bhuvan Bam or Prajakta Koli jumps on a trend, expect it to explode. Right now, promoting healthy living with some Yoga asana is in trend. And guess what? Baba Ramdev is a part of the trend too. Think about partnering with influencers who genuinely vibe with your brand. Authenticity is key, people!

Just remember to do it genuinely and responsibly. This can generate traction even today - 07/11/2024.
